lead_paragraph: The former Harvard and Fordham swim instructor Joe Bernal has been barred from coaching for life by USA Swimming, which said he violated sexual misconduct policies.
snippet: The former Harvard and Fordham swim instructor Joe Bernal has been barred from coaching for life by USA Swimming, which said he violated sexual misconduct policies.
abstract: USA Swimming bars Joe Bernal from coaching for life, after concluding former Harvard and Fordham swim instructor violated sexual misconduct policies.
